title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)) with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Salmon Rod Ordinary Licences
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Salmon Rod Ordinary Licences 

(Alteration of Licence Duties) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited salmon rod ordinary licence (alteration licence duties) order 2021

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)) with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2022 and has effect as
text_raw:
2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2022 and has effect as 
respects licences issued or renewed for a period commencing on or after that 
day.
text_norm: 2 order come operation 1 january 2022 effect respect licence issued renewed period commencing day

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)) with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 3. The ordinary licence duty in respect of a salmon rod licence of a class
text_raw:
3. The ordinary licence duty in respect of a salmon rod licence of a class 
specified in column (2) of the Schedule at any reference number is altered to the 
sum specified in column (3) of that Schedule at that reference number.
text_norm: 3 ordinary licence duty respect salmon rod licence class specified column (2) schedule reference number altered sum specified column (3) schedule reference number

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)) with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 4. The Salmon Rod Ordinary Licences (Alteration of Licence Duties) Order
text_raw:
4. The Salmon Rod Ordinary Licences (Alteration of Licence Duties) Order 

2011 (S.I. No. 613 of 2011) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE

(1)

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)) with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE. 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order prescribes the licence fees payable from 1 January 2022 in respect of 
salmon rod ordinary fishing licences and the Foyle Area extension licence 
including a salmon conservation levy equivalent to 50% of the licence fee. The 
proceeds of this levy will be invested in wild salmon management initiatives 
designed to rehabilitate wild salmon stocks and habitats. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [732]
